Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is concluded that intragastric pressure increases significantly during muscle fasciculations caused by suxamethonium in healthy children .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Muscle fasciculations in healthy children |

The paragraph is not explicitly mentioning any specific disease or condition related to intragastric pressure increase, but it is stating that muscle fasciculations in healthy children cause this increase. Therefore, the only valid disease entity in this paragraph is "Muscle fasciculations in healthy children".
